name: jsonc-pragma
description: A simple, yet powerful pragma analyzer and utility library for JSON with Comments

scripts.build: run clean && microbundle --target node --no-sourcemap --compress -f cjs && yarn types
scripts.watch: run clean && microbundle watch --target node -f cjs
scripts.types: tsc -p . -m amd -d --out types/main.js && shx cp types/main.d.ts dist && shx rm -rf types && node scripts/postprocess.js
